mapper.select:
SELECT a.id, a.work_unit workUnit, a.department, a.job, a.station, DATE_FORMAT(a.start_time,'%Y-%m-%d') startTime, DATE_FORMAT(a.end_time, '%Y-%m-%d') endTime, DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') createTime, a.enclosure, b.user_name userName, b.job_number jobNumber, b.state FROM sys_staff_job_resume a, sys_eve_user_staff b WHERE a.staff_id = b.id
AND b.user_name LIKE '%${userName}%'
AND b.job_number LIKE '%${jobNumber}%'
AND a.work_unit LIKE '%${workUnit}%'
AND a.department LIKE '%${department}%'
AND b.state = #{state}
ORDER BY a.create_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_staff_job_resume (id, start_time, end_time, work_unit, department, job, station, enclosure, staff_id, create_time) VALUES (#{id}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{workUnit}, #{department}, #{job}, #{station}, #{enclosureInfo}, #{staffId}, #{createTime})
